name: Stn
description: A web-based app for shortening long links & managing them in one place. I designed & developed all parts of the app from scratch.

name: Prosentra
description: A crowdsourcing platform to discover programming learning resources. I designed, developed, & deployed all parts of the app: the frontend app, the API, & the database.

name: Tokoplay
description: A web app that can enhance shopping experience through videos. I designed, developed, documented, & deployed the frontend app, the API, & the database within a 2-week timeframe.

name: Chordion
description: A handy reference for chord construction. I designed the UI, implemented it into frontend code using modern build tools, & deployed the site on a web hosting.
